# The `BlockFrequencyInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> pass uses <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimpl">BlockFrequencyInfoImpl</a> implementation to estimate IR basic block frequencies. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::BlockFrequencyInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfo">BlockFrequencyInfo</a> pass uses <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimpl">BlockFrequencyInfoImpl</a> implementation to estimate IR basic block frequencies.

### getBlockFreq() {#ab8b72c18add22acd827f7a6cd1ff1bff}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>BlockFrequency BlockFrequencyInfo::getBlockFreq (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB) const</>}>
getblockFreq - Return block frequency.

Return 0 if we don&#39;t have the information. Please note that initial frequency is equal to ENTRY&#95;FREQ. It means that we should not rely on the value itself, but only on the comparison to the other block frequencies. We do this to avoid using of floating points.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-h/#l00065">65</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-h">BlockFrequencyInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-cpp/#l00200">200</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-cpp">BlockFrequencyInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getBlockProfileCount() {#a45e6b2c5c4e59ddc05ad9a2685706e75}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; uint64&#95;t &gt; BlockFrequencyInfo::getBlockProfileCount (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB, bool AllowSynthetic=false) const</>}>
Returns the estimated profile count of <code>BB</code>.

This computes the relative block frequency of <code>BB</code> and multiplies it by the enclosing function&#39;s count (if available) and returns the value.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-h/#l00071">71</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-h">BlockFrequencyInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-cpp/#l00205">205</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/blockfrequencyinfo-cpp">BlockFrequencyInfo.cpp</a>.

### getProfileCountFromFreq() {#a02c90557d0de0a6573903a55ef08f20d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; uint64&#95;t &gt; BlockFrequencyInfo::getProfileCountFromFreq (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> Freq) const</>}>
Returns the estimated profile count of <code>Freq</code>.

This uses the frequency <code>Freq</code> and multiplies it by the enclosing function&#39;s count (if available) and returns the value.
